items.title: Fresh Mint Toothpaste
items.content: Experience long-lasting freshness with our Fresh Mint Toothpaste. Fights cavities and leaves your mouth feeling clean.

items.title: Electric Toothbrush
items.content: Upgrade your oral hygiene routine with our Electric Toothbrush. Provides superior cleaning and plaque removal.

items.title: Kids Toothpaste
items.content: Make brushing fun for your little ones with our Kids Toothpaste. Delicious flavors and gentle formula for young teeth.

items.title: Travel Toothpaste Holder
items.content: Keep your toothpaste safe and secure while traveling with our Travel Toothpaste Holder. Compact and leak-proof design for on-the-go use.

items.title: Whitening Toothpaste
items.content: Achieve a brighter smile with our Whitening Toothpaste. Removes stains and protects against future discoloration.

items.title: Sensitive Teeth Toothpaste
items.content: Relieve tooth sensitivity with our Sensitive Teeth Toothpaste. Gentle formula provides effective relief without harshness.

items.title: Charcoal Toothpaste
items.content: Detoxify your mouth with our Charcoal Toothpaste. Removes impurities and leaves your breath feeling fresh.

items.title: Herbal Toothpaste
items.content: Embrace the power of nature with our Herbal Toothpaste. Natural ingredients promote healthy teeth and gums.

items.title: Fluoride-Free Toothpaste
items.content: Enjoy fluoride-free protection with our Fluoride-Free Toothpaste. Safe for the whole family.

items.title: Sonic Toothbrush
items.content: Experience the power of sonic technology with our Sonic Toothbrush. Removes plaque and stains for a brighter smile.

items.title: Soft Bristle Toothbrush
items.content: Gently clean your teeth and gums with our Soft Bristle Toothbrush. Perfect for those with sensitive mouths.

items.title: Medium Bristle Toothbrush
items.content: Achieve a thorough clean with our Medium Bristle Toothbrush. Removes plaque and debris for a fresh mouth.

items.title: Hard Bristle Toothbrush
items.content: Get a deep clean with our Hard Bristle Toothbrush. Removes tough stains and debris for a healthier smile.

items.title: Children's Toothbrush
items.content: Encourage good oral hygiene habits with our Children's Toothbrush. Designed for small hands and developing smiles.

items.title: Kids Dental Floss
items.content: Teach your kids the importance of flossing with our Kids Dental Floss. Easy-to-use design and gentle on young gums.

items.title: Children's Mouthwash
items.content: Complete your child's oral care routine with our Children's Mouthwash. Mild formula with fun flavors to keep mouths fresh.

items.title: Toothbrush Case
items.content: Protect your toothbrush from dirt and damage with our Toothbrush Case. Fits most standard toothbrushes and perfect for travel.

items.title: Dental Floss Picks
items.content: Simplify flossing with our Dental Floss Picks. Easy-to-use design with built-in floss for convenient oral care.

items.title: Tongue Scraper
items.content: Improve oral hygiene and freshen breath with our Tongue Scraper. Removes bacteria and debris for a cleaner mouth.
